https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fuFsa7iHp2rlz9Ses6v316Hl1U3.jpg A girl of about ten carries a little suitcase when arriving at an intercity bus terminal. She was abandoned by her mother a week ago. Not knowing what to do and why her mother left her, she decides to find a man who might be her father and who she has never met before. Ash Flower
